snippet: Mr. Letterman signed off on Wednesday with an all-star edition of the “Late Show,” bringing his 33-year career in late-night television to a close.
abstract: David Letterman hosts his final Late Show following 33-year run; episode features parade of celebrity guests who offer retrospectives and reminiscences; Letterman himself, in characteristic manner, aims for laughs rather than maudlin sentiment.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Letterman signed off on Wednesday with an all-star edition of the “Late Show,” bringing his 33-year career in late-night television to a close.

headline.main: David Letterman, Ending an Era, Goes for Laughs Instead of Tears
headline.print_headline: Closing Out a Late-Night Era, Letterman Goes for Laughs Instead of Tears

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: Late Show With David Letterman (TV Program)
